ComicInfo.Summary:
There can be only one... only one all-new, action-packed, monthly comic book series starring the Immortal Highlander!
Issue #6 kicks off the second exciting story arc from writer Brandon Jerwa, Who's joined by artist Fabio Laguna as they present the Dark Quickening! Connor is joined by Duncan as the two MacLeod's race to save Connor's very soul from the dark influence of the Kurgan!
This exciting new story also features a tale of the two cousin in a past adventure as they help a fellow immortal recover from his own "dark quickening"! Also, this month, look for special covers from Michael Avon Oeming, Pat Lee, Dave Dorman and David Michael Beck!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Michael Avon Oeming | 1 | B | Cover B | Pat Lee | 2 | C | Cover C | Dave Dorman | 3 | D | Cover D | David Michael Beck | 5 | RI | Retailer Incentive - Black-and-White Sketch Cover | David Michael Beck | 4 |
